content.text: Hello. I'm planning to work on my model car project and go to a baseball game.
Hi. What kind of model car project? I collect vintage cars.
I'm making a model of a 1957 Chevy Bel Air. It's my favorite car.
That's a great car. I have a 1964 Mustang that I'm restoring.
Thanks. I'm a scientist by trade, but I'm also a bit of a car guy.
That's cool. I'm just an accountant. I don't have much time for hobbies.
You should make time for hobbies. They're important for your mental health.
Good for you. What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to go to the movies, play video games, and read.
Nice. I like to go to the movies too. I don't really play video games or read much.
I like to read a lot of science fiction and fantasy.
That's cool. I should read more. I'm always learning new things at work, but I don't always have time to read for pleasure.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I usually only have time to read on the weekends.
That's when I do most of my reading too
